events.title: Henry O. Flipper becomes the first black man to graduate from West Point military adademy

movie.title: The Trial of the Moke
movie.plot: "The Trial of the Moke" is about the first black man to graduates from West Point. Flipper is framed for embezzlement by his fellow cadets to drive him away. But Flipper wasn't going anywhere until he cleared his name.
